channel.title: [Bugs] List
channel.description: [u]This is the problems i had.[/u] FPS drop at the green goo right before you get of the tram in the beginning. bm_c1a4e green goo saw thing - fps drop When the first Houndeye appears - fps drop. 3 head monster - fps drop. Running from gargantuan/blowing the antenna, c2a5g - fps drop. Game crashes after turning on the ventilator. Random crash when Gordon is colliding with Headcrabs and/or other props. Game crash in c2a5b walking through the pibes (Can't load lump 53, allocation of 962657 bytes failed) Smoke from helicopter looks wierd? - Dam bm_c2a5a Game crash c2a5c, canyon when shooting down helicopter. many red error messages in console (Physics queue not empty, error!...etc) The FPS Drop may be a computer problem. But i have no other problems in other Source games. min( when dropping): 30-40 you can feel the lagging/stutter when i drops avg: 120 max: 300 OS: Windows 8 Pro RTM, 64 bit MB: Rampage III extreme CPU: i7-950 (NO OC) RAM: Corsair 12GB (1600mhz) GFX: GAINWARD 580 GTX 3GB Harddrive: SSD 120GB SCREEN RES: 1080p Nice game :slight_smile: EDIT: BTW settings on MAX :stuck_out_tongue: added more errors. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T17_25_33C0.mdmp (110 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T17_26_14C0.mdmp (111 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T17_2_30C0.mdmp (98.5 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T23_33_21C0.mdmp (104 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T13_7_53C0.mdmp (104 KB)

item.title: [Bugs] List
item.dc:creator: fidq
item.description:
This is the problems i had.

FPS drop at the green goo right before you get of the tram in the beginning.

bm_c1a4e green goo saw thing - fps drop

When the first Houndeye appears - fps drop.

3 head monster - fps drop.

Running from gargantuan/blowing the antenna, c2a5g - fps drop.

Game crashes after turning on the ventilator.

Random crash when Gordon is colliding with Headcrabs and/or other props.

Game crash in c2a5b walking through the pibes (Canâ€™t load lump 53, allocation of 962657 bytes failed)

Smoke from helicopter looks wierd? - Dam bm_c2a5a

Game crash c2a5c, canyon when shooting down helicopter.

many red error messages in console (Physics queue not empty, error!..etc)

The FPS Drop may be a computer problem. But i have no other problems in other Source games.

min( when dropping): 30-40 you can feel the lagging/stutter when i drops
avg: 120
max: 300

OS: Windows 8 Pro RTM, 64 bit
MB: Rampage III extreme
CPU: i7-950 (NO OC)
RAM: Corsair 12GB (1600mhz)
GFX: GAINWARD 580 GTX 3GB
Harddrive: SSD 120GB
SCREEN RES: 1080p

Nice game

EDIT: BTW settings on MAX

added more errors.
